name: The Adventures of Dr. Hoss: a Tale of a Tangled Timestream
name_original: The Adventures of Dr. Hoss: a Tale of a Tangled Timestream
description:
Get ready for Action! Danger! and Excitement! in The Adventures of Dr. Hoss: a Tale of a Tangled Timestream. Use the power of portals and science to travel from 2300 to the not-so-distant past in order to save an orbital research station from disaster.

This game was made in one weekend by Team Event Horizon for ScoreSpace Jam #11. The jam's theme is "Teleportation".

Controls:

  • A/D or arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • E/Ctrl to lift, throw, and interact
  • Q/Alt to lift and drop

Thank you for playing!
